plot: Scott Reardon tells his compelling story from the day he lost his leg to when he became world champion water-skier and Paralympic Champion.
title: On Track
plot_es: Scott Reardon tells his compelling story from the day he lost his leg to when he became world champion water-skier and Paralympic Champion.
plot_en: Scott Reardon tells his compelling story from the day he lost his leg to when he became world champion water-skier and Paralympic Champion.
